description.lang: This device is a multiple functions button switch. It is able toswitch the appliances on/off or adjust the percentage of dimmer.It can also work as a timer. The well designed wall bracket andmagnetic back let the switch can be fixed on the wall. This productcan be included and operated in any Z-Wavenetworkwith other Z-Wavecertified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications.
Control the value representedby the left-side in area D. E.g. Setting this configurationto 0x0F means range of Command Basic Set value start from 0x0F
Control the value represented by the left-side in area D.
The interval time for auto report the battery level. 0 means turn off auto report battery. The default value is 12.The value is in minutes.Each unit means 30 minutes
The interval time for auto report thebattery level.
Control the value representedby the right-side in area D. E.g. Setting this configurationto 0x1E means range of Command Basic Set value start from 0x1E
Control the value represented by the right-side in area D.
Dimmer settingmethod. 0 : Auto send Command Basic Set after rotating. 1 : Send Command Basic Setby touching key after rotating
Disable buzzer in timer mode. 0: Enable. 1: Disable.
Send Central Scene Holding when the button is held.
Send Central Scene Holdingwhen the button is held. 0x00: Enable. 0x01: Disable.
